entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the main character who has a conversation with Cho and Seamus. He is mentioned as becoming Minister of Magic and having twelve children in his future.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is described as catching up with Harry and apologizing for crying over an interview. She gives him a kiss on the cheek.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is described as stepping out of the queue to face Harry and telling him that he believes in him.

relationships.description: Cho apologizes for crying over an interview, showing a positive relationship between the two.
Seamus shows support for Harry by telling him that he believes in him and sending his mother a copy of the magazine.
